entity.name: Nancy Pelosi
entity.description: US House of Representatives Minority Leader Nancy Pelosi (CA-12)

text: @SpeakerPelosi The situation we are in today is because Democrats put political agenda ahead of our country. If they had focused on the coronavirus instead of pushing a partisan impeachment they knew would fail, we would be in much better shape. Resign Nancy, you are senile.
